description.action: Evan cautiously enters the throne room, his owl eyes scanning the room for any signs of danger. He sees the captive children huddled in the corner and his expression turns to one of concern.
Isaac, in his koala form, moves slowly and quietly, keeping close to Evan as they enter the throne room. His gaze is fixed on the captive children, his concern evident in his body language.
Aaron, now a small dinosaur, stays close to his siblings, his sharp eyes scanning the room for any threats. His protective instincts are heightened as he sees the other children in distress.
Aurelia, in her panda form, cautiously enters the throne room, her large eyes taking in the scene. She moves to join her siblings, ready to offer comfort and support to the captive children.
